tech_news.title: How Playing Pokémon Became the Ultimate Test of AI’s Intelligence - The Wall Street Journal
tech_news.description: Nintendo’s original Pokémon games are becoming a popular and strangely effective way to test and benchmark new artificial-intelligence models. “We’re all a whole bunch of nerds,” said the man behind the trend.
